IP_SYN_0_style_7:
[Indication]
Right lower lobe segmental obstruction, mucous plugging.
[Anesthesia]
Conscious sedation (Fentanyl 100mcg, Versed 4mg).
[Description]
Flexible bronchoscopy performed. Diffuse tracheobronchitis and thick yellow mucus id[REDACTED] throughout bilateral airways. Therapeutic aspiration of mucus plugs completed. RLL lateral segment wash obtained.
[Plan]
Monitor for resolution. Await culture results.
